memberdef.name: MACRO1
memberdef.initializer: template<BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_decl_params(SeqU)> \ typename boost::mpl::apply1< \ F, \ boost::mpl::vector<BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_params(SeqU)> \ >::type \ operator()( BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_decl_args(SeqU) )const{ \ return this->derived().template impl<BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_params(SeqU)>( \ BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_args(SeqU) \ ); \ } \

memberdef.name: MACRO
memberdef.initializer: template<BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, typename T)> \ typename boost::mpl::apply1< \ F, \ boost::mpl::vector<BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, T)> \ >::type \ operator()( BOOST_PP_ENUM_BINARY_PARAMS(N, T, &_) )const{ \ return this->derived().template impl< \ BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, T) \ >( BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, _) ); \ } \ \ template<BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, typename T)> \ typename boost::mpl::apply1< \ F, \ boost::mpl::vector<BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, const T)> \ >::type \ operator()( BOOST_PP_ENUM_BINARY_PARAMS(N, T, const &_) )const{ \ return this->derived().template impl< \ BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, const T) \ >( BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, _) ); \ } \
